title: Infinix INBook X1 Core i3 10th Gen - (8 GB/256 GB SSD/Windows 11 Home) XL11 Thin and Light Laptop  (14 inch, Starfall Grey, 1.48 kg)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, Power Adaptor, User Guide, Warranty Documents
product_specification.Screen Type: Full HD IPS Display ( 300nits peak brightness, 100% sRGB, NTSC 72%)
product_specification.Additional Features: Microsoft Office 365 with one month free trial

product_description.Sleek and Stylish: Designed with an aircraft-grade aluminium finish, the full-metal Infinix INBook X1 Core i3 Laptop will grab eyeballs wherever you go. And, thanks to its sleek 16.3 mm body and overall weight of merely 1.48 kg, this laptop is easy to take with you even when you’re on the move.
product_description.Fast Charging: Equipped with a 65 W multi-utility USB Type-C fast charger, this laptop can be efficiently charged up to 70% in just up to 55 minutes. And, the USB Type-C charger can also be used to charge your smartphone, which eliminates the need to carry a separate charger for your mobile phone and laptop, adding to your convenience.
product_description.Long Playback Time: You can watch videos for up to 13 hours without having to stay tethered to a power outlet, courtesy of this laptop's 55 Wh long-lasting battery capacity. This way, you can easily work on your deadlines, complete assignments, and binge-watch your favourite TV shows.
product_description.Full HD Display: Sporting a 35.56 cm (14) FHD display along with 100% sRGB Color Gamut and a peak brightness of 300 nits, this laptop ensures precise, sharp, and clear colours. In addition, its sleek bezel lets you enjoy a wide view for an engaging viewing experience.
product_description.High-speed Performance: The combination of a high-performance Intel Core processor chip, high RAM size, and sufficient storage capacity allows you to seamlessly multitask with minimal lag. Moreover, this laptop’s NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD facilitates rapid boot times, game-loading, and data transfer, lending you a seamless experience.
product_description.Windows 11 Operating System: Integrated with a pre-installed Windows 11 Operating System, this laptop lets you access a host of handy Windows services and tools. Furthermore, its advanced UI lets you complete multiple tasks with ease.
product_description.Privacy Protection: In case there are any spyware apps and software in this laptop, the hardware-based privacy switch turns off the mic and camera, ensuring optimal safety.
product_description.Backlit Keyboard: Boasting a backlit keyboard, this laptop lets you type comfortably even when you’re using it in an environment with low light. Also, its illuminated keys offer this laptop an elegant look.
product_description.DTS Audio Processing: The DTS Audio Processing feature of this laptop delivers rich sound for a realistic listening experience. Moreover, equipped with four speakers, this laptop lets you experience 360-degree surround sound, ensuring an immersive audio experience.

review:
No other laptops can't beat this, at this price segment ⚡⚡⚡✨✨✨✨
✨Display - Best
✨Build - best in this segment ( except ports )
✨Battery backup : 6 - 8 hours for normal usage in 80% brightness with WiFi
✨ Fan noise almost equal to zero as mentioned by company
✨ For students its specifications are more than enough
✨ Windows 11 runs very smoothly on i3 10th gen also

Let's see how is the infinix after sale service !

First of all the design is superb. Its compact and looks sturdy. The body gives the feeling of a premium laptop.
The display is excellent. 100% sRGB with 300nits brightness. Not even the top laptop brands are giving that in this price range.
Keyboard is OK with backlit. The backlit is not even through out but it's justifiable.
Speakers are really loud. You won't have any problem in watching movies. Listening to music is another joy.
Battery is superb. I used the laptop for more than 4hrs and there is still 43% battery remaining.
Ports are decent in number but they are a little bit tight but not a deal breaker.
Charging speed is very good with type C to type C cable.
8GB Ram and 256GB NVMe ssd combination is good. It comes with i3 10th gen dual core processor which is sufficient for normal tasks like web browsing, online classes, office apps, watching movies etc.
Not suitable for playing games.
.
This is my review after 1 day of use. This laptop is highly recommended for basic tasks.
Don't let the brand name fools you. It's a very good product.

1.First Flipkart Love it ❤️ Very Fast Delivery 🚚

2.Design a no.1 top notch👌

8. The Trackpad Performance. Is Very 😔 bad😡
Any Time 3to5 time's tuch do it's a bad one


This price point 👉 good 👍❤️

The design and build quality seems premium. The size is smaller than average laptops as it is 14inch. Note that it is made in China, although the brand is of Hong Kong.

The keyboard is very easy to use and spacious. Track pad is good but the trackpad buttons sometimes need to be pressed 2-3 times to click.

Same goes for the power button, it never turns on in a single press. The power button light is also blue which for me is very difficult to notice. It should have been normal white light.

The screen is nice. Sound is superb. Lightweight and small size are good for portable use.

The laptop lid cannot be opened with a single hand. Use one hand to keep the laptop base down and other hand to open the lid.

There are sufficient ports to use but no CD drive. The charge cable received is type-C, but the cable is not very long. Also there is one AC power port which i dont know how to use as there is no cable provided for it. If someone knows then please tell me.

Overall it is good. The only problems i have are with the trackpad buttons and power button.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

If you have near by infinix service center you can purchase this product 👍.
